definition: to apply (knowledge etc) creatively and flexibly/to use a word flexibly (e.g. a noun as an adjective)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to creatively combine learning with usage/to learn and apply pragmatically

sentences.english: Our supplies for this month are in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我們這個月的生活用品在櫥子裏。

sentences.english: Blue Allover is the most representative daily article and decorating article in the area South of Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 藍印花布是江南最有代表性的生活用品和裝飾用品。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a rubber belt box with a cutting knife, which belongs to the daily necessaries.
sentences.chinese: 具有切割刀的膠帶盒是屬於日常生活用品。

sentences.english: In ancient Chinese, flexible use of vocabulary is a common phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 在古代漢語中，詞類活用是一種普遍的現象。

sentences.english: The products in 916 Cultural Square aroused the guests' interests.
sentences.chinese: 文化廣場內的舊式生活用品引起人們的興趣。

sentences.english: The appearing of the living goods structures a non-logical "true" room.
sentences.chinese: 生活用品的出現構建了一個非邏輯化的“真實”空間。

sentences.english: Pa3. L15. and packed the oxen with our supplies.
sentences.chinese: 把生活用品都讓牛馱着。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a clothes airing hanger belonging to the technical field of household goods.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種晾衣架，屬於生活用品技術領域。

sentences.english: English, as a living language, is changing all the time.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一門活學活用的語言，英語始終處於變化之中。

sentences.english: A book-type tissue bag belongs to the field of articles for daily use.
sentences.chinese: 書本式面紙包，屬於人們日常生活用品領域。

sentences.english: A headwind-going vehicle is made of the pulleys used in curtain track, and some routine things.
sentences.chinese: 利用窗簾軌道中的滑輪和日常生活用品製作了逆風車。

sentences.english: I had in mind something along the lines of the Liveville Philharmonic Orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 我心裏想的是“活用村愛樂管弦樂團”之類的。

sentences.english: So it's something you should learn easily and use often.
sentences.chinese: 因此這是個你好掌握的句型同時要活學活用。

sentences.english: Vocabulary teaching should comprise the content of helping students "study and use vividly".
sentences.chinese: 詞彙教學必須包括幫助學生“活學活用”的內容。

sentences.english: All our supplies have to come up by this railway.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有的生活用品都得靠這條鐵路運送。
不要死記硬背，而要活說活用。

definition: to be good at using (sth)/to put (sth) to good use
to study sth to apply it/study for practical applications
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
